mapper.insert: insert into myMember(userId, userPass, userName) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName})
mapper.select: select userId, userName, userPass from myMember where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
mapper.update: update myMember set userPass = #{userPass} where userName = #{userName}
mapper.delete: delete from myMember where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
